title: Looking for ranked team or duo adc s5
body:
Hi, I'm looking for a adc duo, or a semi-serious, or fun ranked team
Support main;
Thresh
Blitz
And can play any other support as well,
I'm an all round player able to play all my roles with knowledge my order from best to least goes, No specific order in champs
Support: Thresh, Blitz, Bard, Annie, Leona, Sona, Brum, Tahm Kench ect,
Adc: Kalista, Caitlyn, Vayne, Draven. Tris
Top: Illoise, Renekton, Irelia. Shen
Mid: Ekko, Syndra, Annie
Jungle: Udyr, Vi, Lee Sin, Xin
I'm usually always online on skype and on league, i prefer the team to have a communication, via skype, curse, teamspeak or something as well as my duo,
My skype name is Hayden.Watkins69 if you can not reach me on League

replies.body:
Come join us at TG. We are expanding and will have a few ranked 5's teams soon.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/chGsOPox-tactical-gaming-is-recruiting-again-oce-members-wanted-all-welcome
